body: Hi, Mostapha I have a basic problem, but I couldn't solve it. I tried to do daylight analysis and keep getting error message says "1. Solution exception:honeybee_materialLib". I found one post in this discussion regarding this issue at [here](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/honeybee-materiallib-exception?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1123099&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987), and followed the solution it has, but it didn't work. (I downloaded OpenStudioMasterTemplate.idf and copied it into ladybug folder.) I installed Daysim & Radiance properly. (They are all under c:\) I attached the image of error message and the image of the honeybee component. I wish I can experience honeybee's powerful capability! Thanks for your help! Sangyong [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/51GNwYDFQ0TJm1K-XaT1ltaMyqiaQN21qxEy1*EU9ceOJ3b3I5OQOhXotaHKYpBA2yndXlOXzZ3X-nDzxq3DWcnHWu64RBNC/ErrorMessage.jpg) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/51GNwYDFQ0Rt2wLGxG2MW3OdsHwyhUYG3Tr3baNJrHCR8M0bjEpMIcwDPVQ4UGK70I6M9zLoOyq9jitdRMdANnIjeep3CGgS/honeybee.jpg)
